name: lntrn.io
description: ### API docs     "/"         GET             returns index.html     "/posts"         GET             returns random posts with num_post amount             if num_post is not specified just return 1 random post         POST             push a new post to the database             user must be logged in             update the user's post array     "/post:id"         PUT             update a lantern         DELETE             delete the lantern, update the user's post array     "/user/:id"         GET             get a specific user, must be authenticated     "/login"         POST             params are username and password     "/logout"         GET             logout a user
author: Nihar, Brandon, Rizky, Ismael
